title: 5- Q&A at Resurrection of Logos in Toronto, March 2017
description:
Q&A at the Resurrection of Logos event in Toronto, March 2017.  The entire discussion surrounded the possibility of the return of the notion of logos into the contemporary world. 
The  speakers were:

1- Fr. Theodore Paraskevopoulus
2- Jonathan Pageau
3- Dr. Jordan B Peterson
4. Rev. Fr. Geoffrey Ready

You can find more on Christian notions of symbolism and patterns on my website.   

http://pageaucarvings.com/media-and-writings.html

This was originally posted in its entirety on the the channel of Jordan B. Peterson.
https://youtu.be/KVo5hq64B2M
